item.description:
Event 'Western Mass Drupal Meetup - May 6, 2008 @ 6:00 pm' by Rick Hood
6-9pm.

This time we are in "The Garden Room" which is larger.

If you are new to Drupal:
It is a content management system but it takes some time at first to grasp the basic functions, capability and functions of this opensource software- a little basic knowledge of drupal will help tremendously. See link below:

http://drupal.org/abo...
item.how_to_find_us: This meet up is organized by Rick Hood. Just helping spread the word.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western Mass Drupal Meetup
